SELECT BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd AS "BJOBBZWKPRCSSDSTCD" , BjobStgeDstcd AS "BJOBSTGEDSTCD" , BjobStgePtrnName AS "BJOBSTGEPTRNNAME" , BjobFlowCmpoName AS "BJOBFLOWCMPONAME" , TelgmClsID AS "TELGMCLSID" , UnitTelgmLen AS "UNITTELGMLEN" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd, BjobStgeDstcd) ROWNO, BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd, BjobStgeDstcd , BjobStgePtrnName , BjobFlowCmpoName , TelgmClsID , UnitTelgmLen FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBR03
BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd LIKE '%' || #searchBjobBzwkPrcssDstcd# || '%'
BjobStgeDstcd LIKE '%' || #searchBjobStgeDstcd# || '%'
BjobFlowCmpoName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobFlowCmpoName# || '%'
) TMP WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd) AS "TotalCount" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBR03
BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd LIKE '%' || #searchBjobBzwkPrcssDstcd# || '%'
BjobStgeDstcd LIKE '%' || #searchBjobStgeDstcd# || '%'
